name: 2014 Facebook new Design Layout Enhancements
description: New Facebook Design Layout Enhancements, You Can Request an Enhancement I will update accordingly! :)
additional_info: Release Version 1.0.3 - Side Navigation Background White. - Input Fields Font Family & Size Changed - Built for Google Chrome - Font-Family Changed to Tahoma. - Font-Size Changed to 11px. - Slightly Rounded Corners for Images. - Centered Most of Posts Images. - Slightly Shadow Added Around Post Box. - Likes, Comments, Shares Counts Moved to the Right Corner.
